input_text.Prompt:
Using the item specifications and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Trophy 1st Note Kazoo

Item specifications:
Comes in Red or Blue
Made of Durable Plastic
Hum Your Favorite Tunes
Real Instrument

Product description:
input_text.Response A: A unique and fun instrument for children, and adults can have fun too! The Trophy 1st Note Kazoo is a durable plastic kazoo that allows you to hum your favorite tunes and create your own band. They come in red or blue. 1st Note products are real instruments designed to introduce children to music. Encourage your child to play often - it's fun!
input_text.Response B: Introducing the all-new Kazoo 1st Note Trophy! This kazoo has been designed with a built-in microphone and speaker, allowing you to play your favorite tunes anywhere you go! It comes in two vibrant colors - red and blue, giving you the freedom to choose the one that best suits your style. Made of durable plastic, this kazoo is built to last and can withstand rough handling. The microphone and speaker are powered by a single AAA battery which is easily replaceable. Just hum your favorite tunes and the kazoo will amplify your voice, making it the perfect choice for any occasion!
